BasicDescription.Title: Weather View
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Detailed weather forecast.

BasicDescription.Title: The Sky At Night
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Sir Patrick Moore meets Astronomer Royal, Sir Martin Rees, on the 600th programme, to discuss the cosmos, black holes, dark matter and new theories on the origins and future of the universe.

BasicDescription.Title: Lust For Murder
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Paul Cowley is cajoled into going away with his neighbours by his sexy wife Linda. But his vacation turns into a costly nightmare. Stars Virginia Madson. [1993]

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News 24
BasicDescription.Synopsis: BBC ONE joins the BBC's rolling news channel for a night of news, with bulletins on the hour and the headlines every 15 minutes.

BasicDescription.Title: Big Strong Boys
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Coventry Bedroom: If you live in a decorating disaster zone, then the interior design cavalry are here! The Boys build new wardrobes, create a new floor and add bright fresh colours to a bedroom.

BasicDescription.Title: Trading Up
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Caldicot: Trading Up designers Justin Ryan and Colin McAllister are in South Wales where they find an idyllic cottage which they improve for some local buyers. W/S. Then BBC News and Weather.

BasicDescription.Title: Cash In The Attic
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Smith: Dougie and Beryl Smith have a vast crockery collection in their house, and with the help of the team Dougie plans to secretly raise some cash in order to surprise Beryl with a new car.

BasicDescription.Title: Wipeout
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Bob Monkhouse hosts the humorous general knowledge quiz where if you know the subject it's easy but if you don't, wipeout awaits.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest national and international news from the BBC this lunchtime, including Weather.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC London News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest stories from the BBC London newsroom.

BasicDescription.Title: Neighbours
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Michelle is caught out in a lie, and Susan decides it's time to stop divorce proceedings. Meanwhile, Nina records her song and Connor insists on a copy.

BasicDescription.Title: Diagnosis Murder
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Murder By Remote: A wealthy young woman living in a hi-tech house dies in mysterious circumstances. Steve investigates to find an explanation.

BasicDescription.Title: As Time Goes By
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Lionel has a nagging doubt regarding Alistair's overwhelming concern for his book to be a success.

BasicDescription.Title: Fimbles
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBeebies. What do you get if you cross a hairbrush and a hedgehog? Find out when Florrie finds a hairbrush and Pom thinks it's a 'hair-hog'!

BasicDescription.Title: Woody Woodpecker
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Aunt Pecky/Terror Tots/Carney Con: Woody wins a swimming pool but has trouble installing it, Knothead and Splinter go ghost-hunting, then Woody takes Knothead and Splinter to the carnival.

BasicDescription.Title: Mona The Vampire
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Lil' Freddy Frost: When Mr Hyde restores an old ice cream sign of a giant-sized Freddy Frosty, Mona starts to worry that Freddy is responsible for large amounts of fast food going missing.

BasicDescription.Title: Eureka TV
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Fearne Cotton and Kate Heavenor bring you the lowdown on the coolest high tech gadgets including a revolutionary cane for visually impaired people that was inspired by bat biology.

BasicDescription.Title: Ace Lightning
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Nobody's Hero: Helping Ace save the world is taking a toll on Mark, and his parents have grounded him for poor grades. Will Mark decide to turn his back on being a hero?

BasicDescription.Title: Blue Peter
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Matt Baker, Konnie Huq, Liz Barker and Simon Thomas report from across the UK and the world. With celebrity guests, music, sport, food, and a whole lot more.

BasicDescription.Title: CBBC At The Fame Academy
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Get the latest from the Fame Academy where the students compete to win the biggest prize money can't buy.

BasicDescription.Title: Newsround
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Daily news magazine keeping you up to date on the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest national and international news from the BBC. Includes a weather summary.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC London News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest stories from the BBC London newsroom. Followed by the national headlines and Weather.

BasicDescription.Title: Holiday
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Craig Doyle reports on a go as you please tour of New Zealand, Riz Lateef explores Italy's Lake Garda, and ex-EastEnder Lucy Benjamin checks out Europe's hottest weekend break destination, Palma.

BasicDescription.Title: 4 x 4
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Nursing In Crisis: Thousands of nurses are leaving the NHS for better paid careers elsewhere. What are the effects on patient care? Can new schemes help to tackle nursing shortages?

Nursing In Crisis
Thousands of British nurses are leaving the NHS for better paid careers elsewhere. Four reporters investigate the effects on patient care in the UK, examine new schemes to tackle the nursing shortage, and reveal the damage being done in Commonwealth countries as Britain cherry picks their best nurses.

BasicDescription.Title: EastEnders
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Charlie and Peggy decide to rebel against their families and Ian celebrates Laura's pregnancy, but is he as happy as he seems? Meanwhile, Kat and Anthony can't hide their true feelings.

BasicDescription.Title: Airport
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Czech Airlines: Newcomer Karla is put to the test by Stephen Fry on a flight back from Prague, and there's an emergency landing as ambulance partners Jane and Gerard search for two lost fingers.

BasicDescription.Title: Merseybeat
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Under The Cosh: Supt Susan Blake's decision to shoot Rosa Franklin is scrutinised, and PC Jackie Brown risks attending Rosa's funeral with dangerous consequences.

Under The Cosh
While Supt Susan Blake's decision to shoot Rosa Franklin is scrutinised, PC Jackie Brown risks attending Rosa's funeral with dangerous consequences.
Following an argument with Susan, Jackie endangers herself further when she visits Rosa's grave - can her strong words and determination save her?
As PC Larry Barton makes up with Mary Connolly and has a pleasant surprise, Inspector Jim Oultons' father, Bernie, is implicated in a murder enquiry. He is insulted when questioned by his son and they indulge in a personal slanging match. Will things ever be the same between them?

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News At Ten O'Clock
BasicDescription.Synopsis: National and international news, with reports from BBC correspondents worldwide.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC London News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest stories from the BBC London newsroom.
The emergency services have their work cut out when a woman lies unconscious in a river, her limbs smashed to pieces after a motorbike accident. Plus, the yacht race that became a race for life.

Presented by Michael Buerk. After an horrific motorbike accident, a woman lies unconscious in the river, her limbs smashed to pieces. As emergency services go to her rescue, there's the added concern of nearby sluice gates, which can pump out 100 million gallons of water every 20 minutes.
Plus how it took six fire crews and 50 firemen to save the gardener stuck in the mud and how a yachting race became a race for life. Part two next week.

BasicDescription.Title: Film 2002
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Jonathan Ross has a look at some of the likely front runners for next year's Academy Awards. Plus a review of Dirty Pretty Things, which sees the return of Amelie's Audrey Tautou to our screens.

Jonathan Ross has a look at some of the likely front runners for next year's Academy Awards. Plus a review of Dirty Pretty Things, which sees the return of Amelie's Audrey Tautou to our screens, as a Turkish asylum seeker.
17 years after My Beautiful Launderette, director Stephen Frears' latest offering is a film which focuses on the unseen world of the capital's illegal immigrants, the invisible people who keep its economy running smoothly. When one such man, Okwe, a minicab driver by day and a hotel porter at night, stumbles upon the hotel's shady goings on, he finds himself in an impossible dilemma.

BasicDescription.Title: Liquid News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Claudia Winkleman and Colin Paterson round up the week's entertainment news with live reports from around the world.
